name: Novelette
tagline: A ClojureScript engine for visual novels and graphic storytelling on the browser and node-webkit.
body:
# Novelette

Novelette is an easy-to-use and user friendly web engine to build visual novel, graphic adventures and general interactive storytelling. It runs right in the browser in an HTML5 canvas or you can run it in node-webkit on the desktop. 

## Usage

The engine is still incomplete, stay tuned for future updates :)

## Example games

Ludum Dare 31 Entry: http://morg.systems/LD31
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
